content:
2 things:
1. 2/3 congress vote
	gets by the senate, but never the house
	lincoln works hard to get those votes - bribery, favors, jobs, gov jobs, freed confed officers
		ultimately passes by 3 votes

2. 3/4 states vote
	no way states are going to pass, but then, he gets shot
	after that northern states are like "fk it lets pass it" and they do ez
		!! THIS IS SIGNIFICANCE OF LINCOLN ASSASINATION !!
